questions.neutral: You look like you dodged something - true?

hobby.message: Political literature age better than policy?

wrong_hobby_answer: That's not me - In free time, I collect political literature. It's a reminder of what was lost.
neutral_answer: Could say I've dodged an inconvenience, Alex.
Electricity was out, wouldn't want my book exposed.
Old political writings require subtle attention, you know.
